entries.content: Objections are information requests, not rejections.
entries.notes: Implied through discussion on handling objections via website FAQs to preempt sales calls.

entries.content: List top objections from sales calls and address them in website FAQs to pre-qualify leads.
entries.notes: Reduces repetitive objections in sales conversations by educating prospects upfront.

entries.content: Using website content to handle objections like pricing concerns before they arise in sales calls.
entries.notes: Demonstrates proactive objection handling through digital channels.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
